resources.string: Red Alert APP notification channel group
Notifications from Red Alert list app
You have no alerts. Looks like you\'ve got everything covered ;)

Red Alert - shopping priority list

This simple app just displays the clock and has 4 buttons associated each with a radio stream and came from the desire to be able to see the clock in my kithcen and listen to the Radio Guerrilla morning show at a touch of a button, while living abroad. :)
